DOC.brief_summary: This study aim test effect 12-month Healthy Beat Accupunch ( HBA ) exercise program perceive health status sleep quality community-dwelling older adult .
DOC.brief_title: Healthy Beat Accupunch ( HBA ) Exercise Program Community Older Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Phase I : A cluster randomize control trial use test effect six-month , instructor-led Healthy Beat Accupunch ( HBA ) exercise program perceive health status sleep quality community-dwelling older adult . Through use convenience sample strategy , eight community care station approximately 240 old adult Kaohsiung recruit randomly assign base community care station HBA experimental group wait-list control group . Participants experimental group receive HBA exercise program lead trained certified instructor , three time per week , 40 minute per practice six month ; participant wait-list control group continue regular daily activity . One pre-test two post-tests , three month apart , conduct . Phase II : Using method phase I , participant phase I continue practice HBA exercise program , guide DVD , another six month . The feasibility , compliance , effectiveness DVD-led HBA exercise program community-dwelling older adult test , another two post-tests , three month apart , conduct outcome measurement phase I .
DOC.criteria: communitydwelling old adult age 65 Mandarin Taiwanese speaker able stand walk without assistive device cognitive alert able verbally state name , address , answer question participant severe acute cardiovascular , musculoskeletal , pulmonary illness
